# tf.keras.backend.elu

Exponential linear unit.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/elu"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.elu</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/elu"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.elu</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.elu(
    x,
    alpha=1.0
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: A tensor or variable to compute the activation function for.
* <b>`alpha`</b>: A scalar, slope of negative section.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
